data.description: This setting defines the diameter of the filament in order for Ultimaker Cura to calculate the extrusion rate correctly. All Ultimaker filaments have a diameter of 2.85 mm, but you might need to change this setting when using filament from other suppliers.
data.hints:
- Filaments with a diameter of 1.75mm do not work with Ultimaker machines.
- When using 3rd party material, it is advised to change the material profile in the preferences panel instead.
